text: "The Ballad of John and Yoko" is a 1969 song by The Beatles and was released as a non-album single. It has appeared on albums 1967-1970 and 1. It topped the single charts in Australia, Austria, Belgium, Germany, Ireland, the Netherlands, Norway, Switzerland and the United Kingdom. == References == Category:1969 songs Category:The Beatles songs Category:John Lennon Category:Folk songs Category:Rock songs
title: The Ballad of John and Yoko
